Text: Invitation to House Warmingand I have finally gotten the new house in sufficient order to host you to an evening of her favorite chile and refreshments The evening of Saturday Feb th is offered as the best time for us The location OFarrell St between Scott and Pierce Streets The time PM until about PM We look forward to seeing you and yours at our new digs Please let us know of your availability
